医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
RNA酶被发现是出生后心脏细胞能量转移的关键研究人员研究了 Mettl1 对出生后能量代谢和心脏细胞成熟的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/RNA-enzyme-found-key-to-heart-cell-energy-shift-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/RNA-enzyme-found-key-to-heart-cell-energy-shift-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb2de4ba-d57d-4176-91e8-a4ec7a248cec Fri, 29 Nov 2024 09:09:00 -0500 RNA enzyme found key to heart cell energy shift after birth
科学家发现耐药骨髓细胞与快速生长的白血病的不良预后有关研究人员探索 T 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病的治疗耐药性和复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Scientists-identify-drug-pressive-bone-marrow-cells-linked-to-poor-outcomes-in-fast-forming-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Scientists-identify-drug-pressive-bone-marrow-cells-linked-to-poor-outcomes-in-fast-forming-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6711150-c43a-4279-af27-6ec8bbed51dc Fri, 29 Nov 2024 08:56:00 -0500 Scientists identify drug-resistant bone marrow cells linked to poor outcomes in fast-growing leukemia
增强哮喘护理：Bedfont® Scientific Limited 为 FeNO 检测提供重要支持，以响应更新的 NICE 哮喘指南最新的 NICE 哮喘指南强调 FeNO 检测。 Bedfont® 为实施这些变革的医疗保健专业人员提供资源和支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Empowering-Asthma-Care-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Provides-Vital-Support-for-FeNO-Testing-in-Response-to-Updated-NICE-哮喘指南.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Empowering-Asthma-Care-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Provides-Vital-Support-for-FeNO-Testing-in-Response-to-Updated-NICE-哮喘指南.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8719aa6c-ac99-431a-8d89-ee3b0075bd18 Fri, 29 Nov 2024 08:20:00 -0500 Empowering Asthma Care: Bedfont® Scientific Limited Provides Vital Support for FeNO Testing in Response to Updated NICE Asthma Guidelines
STAG2缺失与尤文肉瘤的攻击性增加有关尤文肉瘤是一种发生于儿童和青少年的骨骼和软组织肿瘤。与所有儿童癌症一样，这种癌症很罕见——每年每百万居民中有 9 至 10 例——但它的侵袭性非常强。 25% 的患者对常规治疗反应不佳，并且经常复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/STAG2-loss-linked-to-increased-aggression-in-Ewing-sarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/STAG2-loss-linked-to-increased-aggression-in-Ewing-sarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ce47372-d59b-4302-afc1-f35d1b9893ac Fri, 29 Nov 2024 06:01:21 -0500 STAG2 loss linked to increased aggression in Ewing sarcoma
研究揭示意外怀孕对母亲身心的影响巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU) 的一项研究通过考虑出生前的数据，采用了一种新颖的方法来分析意外怀孕对母亲的身心影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Study-reveals-physical-and-mental-effects-of-unintending-pregnancies-on-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241129/Study-reveals-physical-and-mental-effects-of-unintending-pregnancies-on-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f6d5286-b09e-48c4-8492-ca7906113bb5 Fri, 29 Nov 2024 04:25:35 -0500 Study reveals physical and mental effects of unintended pregnancies on mothers
古代足迹揭示了 150 万年前两种人类物种共存一百万多年前，在肯尼亚图尔卡纳湖沿岸附近一片充满野生动物的炎热大草原上，两种完全不同的古人类在寻找食物时可能擦肩而过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Ancient-footprints-reveal-two-hominin-species-coexisting-15-million-years-ago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Ancient-footprints-reveal-two-hominin-species-coexisting-15-million-years-ago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64a27240-ac7c-4cdd-9480-70b2fdc54cd7 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 21:47:00 -0500 Ancient footprints reveal two hominin species coexisting 1.5 million years ago
昆士兰大学研究人员距离开发治疗移植患者皮肤癌的外用乳膏又近了一步一种有助于预防和治疗器官移植患者皮肤癌的外用乳膏距离开发又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/UQ-researchers-move-closer-to-developing-topical-cream-for-skin-cancers-in-transplant-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/UQ-researchers-move-closer-to-developing-topical-cream-for-skin-cancers-in-transplant-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da2a6c8-ed50-4eec-82b8-b975a04d636e Thu, 28 Nov 2024 21:43:00 -0500 UQ researchers move closer to developing topical cream for skin cancers in transplant patients
黑人运动员面临更高的心脏骤停和死亡风险最近由埃默里大学运动心脏病学家 Jonathan Kim 医学博士领导的《柳叶刀》发表的一项重要数据审查显示，黑人运动员发生心脏骤停 (SCA) 和心源性猝死 (SCD) 的可能性是白人运动员的大约五倍尽管有一些证据表明 SCD 发病率总体有所下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Black-athletes-face-higher-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-arrest-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Black-athletes-face-higher-risk-of-sudden-cardiac-arrest-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=368249a2-47cb-48da-91a7-9fc0d93e0e0f Thu, 28 Nov 2024 21:38:00 -0500 Black athletes face higher risk of sudden cardiac arrest and death
先进显微镜揭示核糖体如何附着到 mRNA 上进行蛋白质合成在细胞内，DNA 携带构建蛋白质的遗传密码。为了构建蛋白质，细胞会复制 DNA，称为 mRNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Advanced-microscopy-reveals-how-ribosomes-attach-to-mRNA-for- Protein-synthesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Advanced-microscopy-reveals-how-ribosomes-attach-to-mRNA-for- Protein-synthesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbb25a92-0276-453b-bf90-294ffcab6f8a Thu, 28 Nov 2024 21:33:00 -0500 Advanced microscopy reveals how ribosomes attach to mRNA for protein synthesis
愤怒推动了社交媒体上错误信息的传播Killian McLoughlin 及其同事的一项新研究表明，包含错误信息的社交媒体帖子比包含可信信息的帖子更容易引起道德愤怒，而这种愤怒会促进错误信息的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Outrage-drives-the-spread-of-misinformation-on-social-media.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241128/Outrage-drives-the-spread-of-misinformation-on-social-media.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97ab7f43-fd8e-4f73-914d-2b406a337046 Thu, 28 Nov 2024 21:29:00 -0500
